name: Duplicate and invalidate flow
description: This activity takes a file name as parameter. Aggregates in the target file are duplicated with "valid" field set to false.

command.value:
.append Aggregates <|
Aggregates
| where fileName == "@{pipeline().parameters.file}"
| where isnull(valid)
| extend valid = false
| extend pipelineRun = strcat(pipelineRun,"_", "@{pipeline().RunId}")
